DOC.brief_title: Clinical Microbiological Efficacy Systemic Ayurvedic Immunomodulator Septilin Treatment Chronic Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE : The present clinical trial design investigate clinical microbiological effectiveness systemic ayurvedic immunomodulator Septilin adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) treatment chronic periodontitis ( CP ) . DESIGN : Sixty five subject present least twelve teeth probe depth ( PD ) ≥4 mm select . 33 subject randomly assign full-mouth SRP + Septilin ( group 1 ) 32 subject assign full-mouth SRP + Placebo ( group 2 ) . The clinical outcome evaluate plaque index ( PI ) , gingival index ( GI ) , clinical attachment level ( CAL ) , PD % sit bleed probe ( % BOP ) baseline ( B\L ) , 10 day , 1 , 3 6 month interval percentage site positive A. actinomycetemcomitans , P. gingivalis T. forsythia record B/L , 3 6 month use polymerase chain reaction .
